pages.text: The $(mob)Crimson Cicaptera$() is an animal found in hot biomes. Unlike other Cicapteras, it fights back when attacked, ramming its target at high speed. Its meat is a decent source of food although due to its retaliation and its hard shell it can be difficult to kill.$(p)It can be bred with $(item)Cactus$(), and can bred with any other Cicaptera.
$(mob)Crimson Cicapteras$() drop $(item)Crimson Cicaptera Husks$() on death. It is used as a red dye, and as such is used to paint various items red, like $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Wool$().
